CustomField.description: Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-016764. This is a concatenated value - Softrax Invoice number - invoice sequence number. It's used to link the record to a Softrax invoice line. This field is the foreign key for a nightly job that synchs invoice lines
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a concatenated value - Softrax Invoice number - invoice sequence number. It's used to link the record to a Softrax invoice line. This field is the foreign key for a nightly job that synchs invoice lines
CustomField.label: SoftraxInvoiceLine
